name: Competishun
description: Mohit Tyagi is an IIT Delhi graduate who has pioneered advanced mathematics lessons in the field of online education. He teaches mathematics and gives IIT-JEE entrance coaching for IIT JEE aspirants. With over 114k subscribers on his YouTube channel, Mr Tyagi believes that education should be accessible, affordable and available to all. His friendly and clear teaching style appeals to students from all walks of life, and the explanations break down complex and obscure concepts into easy-to-understand themes so that once the video ends, you arent left with any doubts . Whether its trigonometry or permutation-combination, everything you need to crack the IIT-JEE entrances can be found in Mohit Tyagis videos. He doesnt just tell you what to learn, but how to learn it as well. With his tips, tricks, shortcuts and other academic inputs backed by 20 years of experience in the industry, you know youve found the right teacher in him.  Some of his students have gone on to achieve high all-India ranks in the entrance. They receive a quality of education similar to that of top institutes in Kota, all from the comfort of their homes. Mohit Tyagi also gives life advice and solutions on Quora, where his answers to some of the most pressing questions faced by students have been appreciated widely. His teaching methods are not just the standard for students, theyre also considered the benchmark of successful online tutoring by other fellow teachers and young IIT-ians wanting to enter this domain.  Now, Mr Tyagi has decided to take his online teaching to the next level by launching his very own eLearning app. Through the app, he will give students a better and more enriched learning experience with digitised study material and online mock test series, among other features. The app follows a freemium model, wherein most of the content can be accessed for free while advanced content needs to paid (a small amount) for. Through this, students will get a complete set of tools needed to perform well academically and succeed.
